name: Gift Man
description:
This is the first original  game I ever made. 

You have 30 seconds to give packages to each building.

Left click on the screen to move  gift man to each location.

Return to the post office to get a new package.

Every time you give a package to a building you gain 7 seconds on the timer.

Try to last as long as possible.

Thank you for playing this game.

 Assets from:

background Photo by FWStudio from Pexels background
music Look Busy from incompetech.com
time alarm by Liquid from flashkit.com
